name: CIvil Money Penalty Payment Collection
tagline: This app is for civil money penalty collection for nursing homes
body: ## This app will serve as a tool for Medicare and Medicaid certified nursing homes who were found to be noncompliant with Federal safety and quality of care standards. The app will retrieve the payment information for civil money penalties imposed by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
